Tailwind CSS - Standalone CDN Version
=====================================

Source: https://cdn.tailwindcss.com
Downloaded: 2026-01-29
File: tailwind.min.js (407,279 bytes / 407KB)

This is the official Tailwind CSS Play CDN standalone version.
It includes the full Tailwind CSS framework with JIT (Just-In-Time) compilation
that runs in the browser.

Usage in HTML:
<script src="/static/vendor/tailwindcss/tailwind.min.js"></script>

Note: This is the latest stable version from the CDN. The specific version
number is embedded in the minified code. For production use with version pinning,
consider using the npm package with a build process instead.

Original CDN: https://cdn.tailwindcss.com
Package Info: https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss
